sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtndiaryinfo ( schdul_id , diary_id , diary_progrsrt , diary_nm , drct_matter , partclr_matter , atch_file_id , frst_regist_pnttm , frst_register_id ) VALUES ( #schdulId# , #diaryId# , #diaryProgrsrt# , #diaryNm# , #drctMatter# , #partclrMatter# , #atchFileId# , SYSDATE , #frstRegisterId# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtndiaryinfo SET schdul_id = #schdulId# , diary_id = #diaryId# , diary_progrsrt = #diaryProgrsrt# , diary_nm = #diaryNm# , drct_matter = #drctMatter# , partclr_matter = #partclrMatter# , atch_file_id = #atchFileId# , last_updt_pnttm = SYSDATE , last_updusr_id = #lastUpdusrId# WHERE 1 = 1 AND schdul_id = #schdulId# AND diary_id = #diaryId#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM comtndiaryinfo WHERE 1 = 1 AND schdul_id = #schdulId# AND diary_id = #diaryId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT schdul_id , diary_id , diary_progrsrt , diary_nm , drct_matter , partclr_matter , atch_file_id , frst_regist_pnttm , frst_register_id , last_updt_pnttm , last_updusr_id FROM COMTNDIARYINFO WHERE schdul_id = #schdulId# AND diary_id = #diaryId#

SELECT A.SCHDUL_ID , A.DIARY_ID , A.DIARY_PROGRSRT , A.DIARY_NM , A.DRCT_MATTER , A.PARTCLR_MATTER , A.ATCH_FILE_ID , A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , A.FRST_REGISTER_ID , A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM , A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID FROM ( SELECT SCHDUL_ID , DIARY_ID , DIARY_PROGRSRT , DIARY_NM , DRCT_MATTER , PARTCLR_MATTER , ATCH_FILE_ID , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , FRST_REGISTER_ID , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM , LAST_UPDUSR_ID , ROWNUM FROM COMTNDIARYINFO WHERE 1=1
SCHDUL_ID = #searchKeyword#
DIARY_ID LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY SCHDUL_ID DESC , DIARY_ID DESC ) A WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN #firstIndex# AND #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM COMTNDIARYINFO WHERE 1=1
SCHDUL_ID = #searchKeyword#
DIARY_ID LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
